EUCLIDEAN RINGS /W ARC
rings 1 - 4 adjust euclidean fill [length , phase offset]
outputs: TR 1-4 
CV1: a CV combined of pattern 1 and 2
5: next step
6: reset/sync of all rings to 0
7: on/off length config mode
8: on/off phase offset config mode

#1
CV 1 N - PN.NEXT 0 PN.HERE 1

#2
CV 2 N PN.NEXT 1

#3
CV 3 N PN.NEXT 2

#4
CV 4 N PN.NEXT 3

#5
ARC.STP

#6
ARC.RST

#7
EVERY 2: ARC.MO 4
OTHER: ARC.MO 0

#8
EVERY 2: ARC.MO 5
OTHER: ARC.MO 0

#M

#I
ARC.MO 0
ARC.SYN 1
L 0 3: ARC.SCR.N I + I 1

#P
16	16	16	16
1	1	1	1
0	0	0	0
16	16	16	16

2	2	2	2
4	4	4	4
6	6	6	6
8	8	8	8

#G
